course_description: Learn the basics of React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
Explore advanced CSS techniques and best practices for creating beautiful and responsive web designs.
Master the fundamentals of SQL for effective database management and querying.
Get started with Python programming language, covering basics to advanced concepts.
Learn the basics of machine learning, including algorithms, models, and applications.
Build dynamic web applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Learn the core concepts of JavaScript programming language for web development.
Explore essential data structures and algorithms for writing efficient code.
Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to become a proficient frontend developer.
Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native framework.
